definition: student of theology/Bachelor of Divinity/Taleban (Farsi: student)

sentences.english: The theology of restoring our people.
sentences.chinese: 对于我们人们重建的神学。

sentences.english: All of these ideas, theories, and theologies fundamentally fail to recognize That which holds it all.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些思想理论和神学根本无法承认它拥有一切。

sentences.english: It avoids the intellectualism of christian theology .
sentences.chinese: 它回避宗教神学的唯理智论。

sentences.english: Goh Teck Sien is our first year missiological student in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 吴哲仙是卫理神学院2009年宣教科一年级学生。

sentences.english: At the beginning of 20th century, the issue that the theologians were concerned about primarily was eschatology.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪开始时，神学家们主要关心的问题是末世论。

sentences.english: Lit-sen Chang, Critique of Indigenous Theology.
Jesus has often been referred to by classic theologians as "the avatar of God."
sentences.chinese: 耶稣经常被传统神学家视为“上帝的化身。”

sentences.english: The paper presents a set of observations on political theology of Sun Yat-sen's thought.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对孙中山思想中的政治神学所做的一些观察。

sentences.english: Biblical Theology provides rich material for systematic theology.
sentences.chinese: 圣经神学为系统神学提供丰富资源。

sentences.english: Biblical Theology provides rich material for systematic theology.
sentences.chinese: 圣经神学为系统神学提供丰富资源。

sentences.english: Ethan Christofferson and his family spent an extended time in America as he studied at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School.
sentences.chinese: 陈义圣牧师则返回美国进入三一神学院继续深造。

sentences.english: This peace of God is not a mere abstraction advocated by preachers and theologians.
sentences.chinese: 神的平安并非由传道人和神学家所传扬的抽象概念。

sentences.english: What is the Discipline of Biblical Theology?
sentences.chinese: 圣经神学是怎样的一门学科？

sentences.english: To wit, Christ's death and resurrection are based on astrotheology.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，基督的死亡和复活是基于占星神学。

sentences.english: One of the nine choirs of angels as listed by the sixth-century theologian Dionysius the Areopagite.
sentences.chinese: 六世纪的神学家狄奥尼修斯列举的九个天使级别之一。

sentences.english: Pastors have neglected their rightful oversight of worship, including the doctrinal content of the music.
sentences.chinese: 牧者们也已经在敬拜，圣乐神学内容上不看重了。

definition: deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe
